授業目的: In this class we will learn how to structure essays. We'll start with paragraphs and build our way up from there. We will write a couple different kinds of essays and also learn how to keep a journal.
授業方法: There will be lectures with a lot of explanations and lots of writing in class to practice.

トピック.授業外学習2: You will be required to write one longer essay and several paragraph writing practices

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: One longer essay and several shorter paragraphs

name: 【200】英語（Ｗｒｉｔｉｎｇ）I　１／English (Writing) I
担当者: エンジェル　ジャレド（ANGEL JARED）
